name: reservoir
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a place for storing liquid, especially a natural or artificial lake providing water for a city or other area
JackF/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a large supply of something: The universities constitute a reservoir of expert knowledge.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a natural or artificial lake for storing and supplying water for an area
A reservoir is also a large supply of something that could be used if needed: There’s a tremendous reservoir of goodwill out there.
